sys_remote_update_set.description: v1.0 Adds 'Print' button to display contents of Update Sets v1.1 Adds ability to select multiple Update Sets in list view v1.2 Adds functionality to consolidate Updates from multiple Update Sets into their respective types
sys_remote_update_set.name: Update Set Printer v1.2

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper = Class.create();
UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	checkDescription: function(){
		var sys_ids = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_ids');
		var us = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		us.addEncodedQuery('descriptionISEMPTY^sys_idIN' + sys_ids);
		us.query();
		if( us.next() ){
			gs.addErrorMessage("Please add Descripiton to '" + us.name.getValue() + "'.");
			return false;
		}
		return true;

	},
	type: 'UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-29 16:38:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetPrinterClientHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-29 16:38:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
